ygData.subject: RE: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I dont mind the younger people, as long as they aren t too young. If you are old enough to drink, you re perfect ;-)  As for your song selections, I have
ygData.messageBody:
> Oooh. Elven wine!
> I love a good wine!
> Sure you want to hang out with someone so young though? You never know what
> kind of songs the wannabes will sing.

I dont mind the younger people, as long as they aren't too young.
If you are old enough to drink, you're perfect ;-) As for your
song selections, I have no quarrels against listening to other
bards regardless of experience. Just make sure you bring enough
booze.

> you: Faesong, lvl 15 Songweaver of SOlusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, TEst
> me: Argh... you do it to tease me don't you Fae? hehe.
> you: What do you mean tease you?

YOur SHift BUtton LOoks a LIttle STuck THere. TEe HEe...

HArm.
